description: Satya Build Keynote analyzer – segments video at key narrative moments and extracts flat metadata for each clip.

config.segmentationDefinition: Segment the video at each significant keynote moment that includes product announcements, demos, major reveals, or moments of high audience engagement. Target approximately 2.5 clips per minute and aim for a total highlight reel duration of about 200 seconds. Personalization is not applied. Each segment should capture exactly one distinct moment.

StartTimeMs.description: Start time of this segment in milliseconds.

EndTimeMs.description: End time of this segment in milliseconds.

Description.description: Natural language description of what happens in this segment.

SegmentType.description: Overall context of this segment within the keynote.

KeynoteEvent.description: Primary keynote moment in this segment.

SpeakerName.description: Name of the person speaking during this segment.

SlideTitle.description: Title or main topic of the slide displayed.

ProductFocus.description: Key product(s) or technology highlighted in this segment.

ExcitementLevel.description: Estimated excitement level based on speaker enthusiasm and audience reaction.

AudienceEngagement.description: Estimated level of audience engagement (e.g., applause, cheering).

KeyMessage.description: Brief summary of the main message or takeaway from this segment.

CallToAction.description: Identified call to action made during the segment (if any).
